title: Rockets, Clippers, LeBron James, Tom Brady and Drew Brees
itunes:title: Rockets, Clippers, LeBron James, Tom Brady and Drew Brees
description:
Filling in for Colin, Doug Gottlieb discusses the Rockets being who we all thought they were, the Clippers coming together at the right time, LeBron James' comments on the MVP award, Tom Brady's possible destination, and why Drew Brees is probably overstaying his welcome. Guests include Chris Broussard, Orlando Scandrick, and Mike Renner.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
